FAQ.label: Organizer
FAQ.content: Organizers: Hamid Sarbazi-Azad and Jeong-A Lee

FAQ.label: What is a GDG?
FAQ.content: A Google Developer Group is a community of volunteers who create exciting projects and share experiences about Google technologies.

FAQ.label: What is DevFest?
FAQ.content: DevFests are community-led developer events hosted by Google Developer Groups around the globe.
